titleStmt.title: Testimonium Jesu, or, The demonstration of the spirit for the confirmation of Christian faith, and conviction of all infidelity a sermon preached before the Right Honourable the Lord Mayor and aldermen of the city of London, at the Guild Hall-Chappel / by Bryan Turner.
titleStmt.author: Turner, Bryan, 1634 or 5-1698.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by S. Roycroft for Walter Kettleby,
